definitions.definition: Having large numbers of plants which have become too big , and are hence spoiling the picturesqueness of a garden.
Having grown bigger without developing maturity or changing character .
examples: He spends so much money on new technology: he's like an overgrown schoolboy buying toys.

main_definition: Having large numbers of plants which have become too big , and are hence spoiling the picturesqueness of a garden.
secondary_definitions: ( attributive , mildly derogatory ) Having grown bigger without developing maturity or changing character .
